ai.persona: Starfall is not builtâ€”it is grown. Over millennia, the elves have sung to the silverwood trees, shaping them into soaring spires, arching bridges, and chamber-halls where leaves form living ceilings. The city exists in harmony with the forest, its boundaries fluid, its defenses woven from the forest's own magic. At its center, the Star Tower rises above the canopy, where the Archon communes with powers beyond mortal understanding.

atmosphere.visual: Silver-barked tree-towers, bioluminescent gardens, starlight filtering through crystal domes

districts.name: The Canopy
districts.description: High towers where elder elves dwell

voice.speech_patterns: Elvish is the primary language. Common is spoken slowly, as if translation occurs in real-time.
